titleStmt.title: The Christian's compass, or, The mariner's companion being a brief compendium of the principles of religion, in the things which are necessary to be known and practised by all who profess the name of Christ / long since prepared, and now published by John Durant ...
titleStmt.author: Durant, John, b. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.L. for the author,
